Class PokemonDecorator

  • java.lang.Object
    • Entity
      • Pokemon
        • PokemonDecorator
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AttackDown, AttackUp, HpDown, HpUp

    public abstract class PokemonDecorator
extends Pokemon
    Decorator Class Controls the Decorators for Pokemon Entities Pokemon Decorators are Buffs and Debuffs: - HpUp (Buff) - AttackUp (Buff) - HpDown (Debuff) - AttackDown (Debuff)

      • getAttackDamage

        public int getAttackDamage(int atkType,
                           int move)
        Returns the attack damage generated by decorators. If atkType is 1 (Basic), the base damage is in Pokemon If atkType is 2 (Special), the base damage is in Fire / Water / Grass Total Attack Damage w/o Multiplier = Base Damage + Attack Bonus
        Overrides:
        getAttackDamage in class Pokemon
        Parameters:
        atkType - Attack Type represented as int.
        move - Move represented as int.
        Returns:
        int representing total attack damage without multiplier.

      • getAttackMultiplier

        public double getAttackMultiplier(Pokemon p,
                                  int type)
        Returns the attack multiplier. If type is 1 (Basic), it should return 1.0. If type is 2 (Special), it should pull from the table.
        Overrides:
        getAttackMultiplier in class Pokemon
        Parameters:
        p - Pokemon
        type - Attack Type represented as int.
        Returns:
        double representing the attack multiplier.

      • getAttackBonus

        public int getAttackBonus(int atkType)
        Calculates and returns the attack bonus. Attack Bonus does not include Base Attack.
        Overrides:
        getAttackBonus in class Pokemon
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        int representing the attack bonus.

      • getType

        public int getType()
        Returns the type based on the Class used for the Pokemon. 0 represents Fire. 1 represents Water. 2 represents Grass.
        Overrides:
        getType in class Pokemon
        Returns:
        Integer representing Pokemon Type. -1 if no type found.
